functions.tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"Summon Earth Elemental","color":"dark_red","bold":true,"italic":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Tier 3","color":"light_purple","bold":true}','{"text":"Calls forth a standard Earth Elemental from the elemental planes; its impact will also damage nearby foes.","color":"dark_purple","italic":true}']},HideFlags:1,SpellBook:1b,Uses:-1,spellData:{Spell:"Summon Earth Elemental",Ritual:0b,MaxUses:-1,LimitedUse:0b},Enchantments:[{}],title:"Summon Earth Elemental",author:"Earthmaster Jabhar",generation:3,resolved:1b,pages:['{"text":"Cast!","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger cast_spell set 1"}}','{"text":"\\"A rift opened, and in an instant a monster of earth came smashing into the ground, knocking my foes flying. The spell appears to have worked.\\"","color":"gold","italic":true}','[{"text":"\\"Azit byest ouf erre, hyd myn cahl!\\"","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true},{"text":"\\n\\n(Great beast of earth, heed my call!)"}]']}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Ion Volt","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Tier 2","color":"light_purple","bold":true}','{"text":"Charges nearby foes with Ionized electricity, slowing them greatly.","color":"dark_purple","italic":true}']},HideFlags:1,SpellBook:1b,Uses:-1,spellData:{Spell:"Ion Volt",Ritual:0b,MaxUses:-1,LimitedUse:0b},Enchantments:[{}],title:"Ion Volt",author:"Thundermaster Baanon",generation:3,resolved:1b,pages:['{"text":"Cast!","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger cast_spell set 1"}}','{"text":"\\"The energy, left unchecked, is capable of rendering the hardiest beasts hopelessly immobile.\\"","color":"gold","italic":true}','[{"text":"\\"Teht myn ene thi ekele powre!\\"","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true},{"text":"\\n\\n(Tether my foes with electric power!)"}]']}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Inferno","color":"red","bold":true,"italic":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Tier 2","color":"light_purple","bold":true}','{"text":"Summons a group of Inferno(s) - searing flames given life via elemental fire - to the area around the caster.","color":"dark_purple","italic":true}']},HideFlags:1,SpellBook:1b,Uses:-1,spellData:{Spell:"Inferno",Ritual:0b,MaxUses:-1,LimitedUse:0b},Enchantments:[{}],title:"Inferno",author:"Firemaster Ignis",generation:3,resolved:1b,pages:['{"text":"Cast!","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger cast_spell set 1"}}','{"text":"\\"Burn! BURN! EVERYTHING, BURN!\\"","color":"gold","italic":true}','[{"text":"\\"Azit spyrs ouf fyr, bryng lyf tu tiz blazz!\\"","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true},{"text":"\\n\\n(Great spirits of fire, bring life to this blaze!)"}]']}
